abstract.text: Creates a video composition object configured to present the video tracks of the specified asset.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: The asset whose configuration matches the intended use of the video composition.
Apple discourages using this method in iOS 16, tvOS 16, and macOS 13 or later. Create a video composition asynchronously using

This method creates the video composition object and configures it with the values and instructions suitable for presenting the video tracks of the specified asset. The returned object contains instructions that respect the spatial properties and time ranges of the specified asset’s video tracks. It also configures the object properties in the following way:
property is short enough to accommodate the greatest nominal frame rate value among the asset’s video tracks, as indicated by the
property of each track. If all its tracks have a nominal frame rate of
, it uses a frame rate of 30 frames per second, with the frame duration set accordingly.
property depends on whether the asset is an
, the render size is the composition’s
value, and for other assets, its a size large enough to encompass all of its video tracks.
If you specify an asset that doesn’t contain video tracks, this method returns a video composition with no instructions.

abstract.text: Work with audiovisual assets, control device cameras, process audio, and configure system audio interactions.
An object that models timed audiovisual media.
An object that supports using Core Image filters to process an individual video frame in a video composition.
An object that combines and arranges media from multiple assets into a single composite asset that you can play or process.
The authored size of the visual portion of the composition.
The frame rate of the track, in frames per second.
An object that describes how to compose video frames at particular points in time.
A video composition tool to use with Core Animation in offline rendering.
A time interval for which the video composition should render composed video frames.
Creates a video composition configured to apply Core Image filters to each video frame of the specified asset.
Creates a video composition object configured to present the video tracks of the specified asset.
The scale at which the video composition should render.
The size at which the video composition should render.
Returns a new video composition that’s configured to apply Core Image filters to each video frame of the specified asset.
Returns a new video composition that’s configured to present the video tracks of the specified asset.

inlineContent.text: The asset whose configuration matches the intended use of the video composition.
